mapper.insert: insert into GOODS_SALES(NUM, GOODSCODE, NICKNAME, PRICE, ORDERDATE, SENDSTATE) values(GOODS_SALES_SEQ.nextval, #{goodsCode}, #{nickname}, #{price}, sysdate, #{sendState})
mapper.select: select count(GOODSCODE) from GOODS_SALES where NICKNAME=#{nickname}
select SA.ORDERDATE, SA.GOODSCODE, GD.GOODSNAME, SA.PRICE, SA.NICKNAME, SA.SENDSTATE from GOODS_SALES SA, GOODS GD where SA.GOODSCODE = GD.GOODSCODE order by SA.SENDSTATE desc, SA.ORDERDATE desc
mapper.update: update GOODS_SALES set SENDSTATE=#{state} where GOODSCODE=#{goodsCode}
